Sentencas: Based on descriptions of the previously assessed sub-systems, we present a thermodynamic description of the La-Mn-Y-Zr-O system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic modeling of the La-Mn-Y-Zr-O system

Sentencas: Ideal extrapolations from ternaries to quaternaries and to La-Mn-Y-Zr-O are proved to be quite successful.
Titulo: Thermodynamic modeling of the La-Mn-Y-Zr-O system

Sentencas: The calculated isothermal sections of pseudo-ternaries at different temperatures in air are in good agreement with available experimental data.
Titulo: Thermodynamic modeling of the La-Mn-Y-Zr-O system

Sentencas: The thermodynamics at the LaMnO3-yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) interface, which is of particular importance for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications, is discussed in detail.
Titulo: Thermodynamic modeling of the La-Mn-Y-Zr-O system

Sentencas: Based on phase equilibrium calculations, we conclude that La2Zr2O7 forms at the LaMnO3-YSZ interface due to its high chemical stability.
Titulo: Thermodynamic modeling of the La-Mn-Y-Zr-O system

Sentencas: Thermodynamically, the La2Zr2O7 formation cannot be prevented by increasing the La deficiency in La1 +/-
Titulo: Thermodynamic modeling of the La-Mn-Y-Zr-O system
Thermodynamic modeling of the La-Mn-Y-Zr-O system

Sentencas: Increasing the yttria content in YSZ can suppress and in the end prevent the La2Zr2O7 formation.
Titulo: Thermodynamic modeling of the La-Mn-Y-Zr-O system

Sentencas: Apart from the temperature and the oxygen partial pressure, other factors, like the phase assemblage at the interface, the La deficiency in La1 +/-
Titulo: Thermodynamic modeling of the La-Mn-Y-Zr-O system

Sentencas: xMnO3 +/-delta, the yttria content in YSZ and so on, also influence the amount of LaO1.5 or MnOx (from LaMnO3) dissolved in YSZ.
